TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVersioningPersonalizable

summary.span: 代表能夠管理舊版 Web Parts 控制項內個人化資料的介面。

span.span: Represents an interface that can manage personalization data belonging to a previous version of a Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您升級為較新版本的 Web 組件控制項時，可能會有可個人化的屬性升級的類別上的變更。When you upgrade a Web Parts control to a newer version, there might be changes to the personalizable properties on the upgraded class. 例如，Web 組件控制項的升級的版本可能不再支援舊版本中可用的屬性。For example, an upgraded version of a Web Parts control might no longer support properties that were available in previous versions. 在這類案例中，Web 組件控制集可能會從基礎資料存放區中，載入個人化資料，但沒有任何屬性，針對要套用這項資料。In such a scenario, the Web Parts control set might load personalization data from the underlying data store, but have no properties against which to apply this data. 如果控制項實作介面，Web 組件控制項傳遞被遺棄的個人化資料。If a control implements the interface, the Web Parts control is passed the orphaned personalization data. 應用程式然後可以使用此資料來更新屬性在較新版本中，或以其他方式使用的資料。The application can then use this data to update properties in the newer version, or use the data in some other manner. 請注意，如果匯入 Web 組件控制項時，會偵測被遺棄的屬性也會呼叫方法。Note that if orphaned properties are detected when importing Web Parts controls, the method is also called.

related.span: 逐步解說： 實作使用者控制的 Web 組件個人化

span.span: Walkthrough: Implementing Web Parts Personalization with a User Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Load(class System.Collections.IDictionary unknownProperties) cil managed

param.name: unknownProperties
param.span: 無法套用至控制項的個人化資料字典。

span.span: A dictionary of personalization data that could not be applied to a control.

summary.span: 將個人化資料載入因版本變更而沒有對應的個人化資料屬性的 Web 組件控制項。

span.span: Loads personalization data to a Web Parts control that does not have a corresponding personalized property for the data due to a version change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `unknownProperties`參數包含合併的表示法的未知的個人化資料，「 使用者 」 與 「 共用 」，無法套用至控制項的範圍。The `unknownProperties` parameter contains a merged representation of unknown personalization data, of both "User" and "Shared" scope, that could not be applied to the control. 當使用者領域中執行頁面時，未知的使用者範圍的值會提供 （如果有的話），而不是未知的共用範圍值。When a page is running in user scope, the unknown user-scope values are supplied (if available) rather than unknown shared-scope values. 這項資訊會儲存為一系列的名稱/值組，其中每個名稱是在控制項找不到屬性的字串名稱，而每個值包含屬性值。This information is stored as a series of name/value pairs where each name is the string name of a property that was not found on the control and each value contains the property value. 它是控制項轉換或將值轉換成適當的型別，並且執行進一步處理 （例如對應將資料從舊的屬性到新的屬性） 的責任。It is the responsibility of the control to cast or convert the value to the appropriate type and carry out further processing (such as mapping data from an old property to a new property). 如果控制項的狀態變更時，它應該呼叫(繼承的方法或在不是衍生自控制項的情況下的公用靜態方法)。If a control's state changes, it should call (either the inherited method, or the public static method in the case of a control that does not derive from ). 如果控制項將其本身標記為 「 中途 」，Web 組件控制項集合會從控制項的"dirty"的狀態，不論控制項擷取個人化資料，並將它儲存回基礎資料存放區中，稍後在個人化生命週期。If a control marks itself as "dirty", the Web Parts control set will extract personalization data from the control, regardless of the control's "dirty" state, and save it back to the underlying data store later in the personalization life cycle. 控制項應該將本身標示為"dirty"if、 處理中的值的結果`unknownProperties`控制項的狀態已變更的參數。A control should mark itself as "dirty" if, as a result of processing the values in the `unknownProperties` parameter, the control's state has changed. 請注意，是否匯入 Web 組件的控制項時，會偵測到被遺棄的屬性，會自動呼叫這個方法。Note that if orphaned properties are detected when importing Web Parts controls, this method is automatically called.
